meanings.definition: The sandy or pebbly shore of the sea.
meanings.sent1: Children built sandcastles on the seabeaches.
meanings.sent2: Tourists love to relax on seabeaches during summer.
meanings.sent3: The seabeaches whispered secrets to the waves.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts washed up on the seabeaches of her mind.
meanings.sent5: Seabeaches sparkle like golden ribbons under the sun.

meanings.definition: To visit or spend time on seabeaches.
meanings.sent1: Families often seabeaches for picnics on weekends.
meanings.sent2: We seabeaches every year to unwind and recharge.
meanings.sent3: I seabeaches yesterday and found a beautiful seashell.
meanings.sent4: His mind loves to seabeaches when life gets overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: Seabeaches beckon us with promises of peace and joy.
